name: HolyComforterSundayService
0:
”Alexa, open holy comforter service”
”Alexa, ask holy comforter service for the latest talk”
”Alexa, start holy comforter service”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: holy comforter service
des: Listen to the latest Church Service from Holy Comforter Lutheran Church in Belmont NC. You can pause and play by saying "Alexa, pause" and "Alexa, resume." Just say "Alexa, stop" when you're done listening.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
